attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The cult of Scientology, as shown by the BBC and many others is a dangerous cult they preys on the most vulnerable of society. Its workers are subjected to conditions which can only be described as disgusting.
Scientology is a dangerous cult, and as such it's teachings and brainwashing should be outlawed in the UK. We therefore ask that Scientology be banned in the UK as undesirable material likely to corrupt.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
